News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness message
News: DSENEWS: All Stock Dealers, Stock Brokers and Authorized Representatives are asked to strictly follow the code of conduct as enumerated in the Second Schedule to the Securities and Exchange Commission (Stock Dealer, Stock Broker and Authorized Representative) Rules, 2000.

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of DSE News): If anyone spreads information based on rumor, using patent of DSE, he/she will be held liable under Copyright Act, 2000 and it shall be treated as punishable offence under Section-17 of the Securities and Exchange Ordinance, 1969. (end)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: DSE does not publish market data through any social media pages. INVESTORS should not rely on any information from an unauthorized source such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Viber, Linkedin etc. (cont.)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of BSEC News - Awareness Message for Investors) 3. Do not pay any heed to rumors at the time of trading shares; it may cause loss to you. Even spreading rumor is legally prohibited. (Ref.: SEC letter no. SEC/SRMIC/2010/726 dated November 23, 2010). (end)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: Investors are requested to consider the following facts at the time of making investment decision in the Capital Market: 1. Without acquiring proper knowledge, information and experience regarding different aspects and matters of Capital Market, one should not invest in the Capital Market. 2. The gain or loss, whichever comes from the investment, it belongs to you. So, well - thought of investment decision based on knowledge and fundamentals of the securities may be real assistance to you. (cont.)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Greetings Message

News Title: LRBDL: Half-Yearly Financials
News: (Half-Yearly Un-audited): EPS was Tk. 0.25 for July-December 2023 as against Tk. 1.05 for July-December 2022. NOCFPS was Tk. 1.40 for July-December 2023 as against Tk. 1.80 for July-December 2022. NAV per share (with revaluation) was Tk. 38.41 as on December 31, 2023 and Tk. 38.36 as on June 30, 2023. NAV per share (without revaluation) was Tk. 34.41 as on December 31, 2023 and Tk. 34.35 as on June 30, 2023.

News Title: UNIONCAP: Clarification on recent news published in a newspaper
News: (Continuation news of UNIONCAP): This is to inform further here that we are in a very initial stage and Bangladesh Bank's approval is a primary and soft consent to consider the feasibility of the merger process that is subject to the approval of the respective Board of Directors as well as the Shareholders of both Union Capital Limited and Prime Bank PLC and also subject to the approval of all the concerned regulatory authorities." (end)

News Title: UNIONCAP: Clarification on recent news published in a newspaper
News: In response to a DSE query dated February 15, 2024 regarding clarification on recent news published in a newspaper regarding "Union Capital might merge with Prime Bank", the company has informed DSE, among others, as follows: "??...Bangladesh Bank has recently given its primarily consent to consider the merger of Union Capital Limited with the Prime Bank PLC. (cont.)

News Title: PBLPBOND: Declaration of Record Date
News: Pubali Bank PLC., issuer of Pubali Bank Perpetual Bond has informed that Record Date for the bond will be on March 13, 2024 for entitlement of coupon payments to be made on March 23, 2024 for the period from September 23, 2023 to March 22, 2024.

News Title: AOL: Postponement of AGM
News: Refer to their earlier news disseminated by DSE 08.01.2024 regarding AGM date, the company has further informed that the AGM will be held on a later date after getting permission from honorable High Court.

News Title: ROBI: Price Limit Open
News: There will be no price limit on the trading of the shares of the Company today (18.02.2024) following its corporate declaration. However, the floor price shall be applicable accordingly.

News Title: ROBI: Dividend Declaration
News: The Board of Directors has recommended 10% Cash dividend for the year ended December 31, 2023. Date of AGM: 24.04.2024, Time: 11:00 AM, Venue: Hybrid (address and link will be shared in due course). Record date: 18.03.2024. The Company has also reported EPS of Tk. 0.61, NAV per share of Tk. 12.76 and NOCFPS of Tk. 7.79 for the year ended on December 31, 2023 as against Tk. 0.35, Tk. 12.82 and Tk. 7.12 respectively for the year ended December 31, 2022.

News Title: DSE NEWS:Commencement of subs. to the units of Southeast Bank 1st Perpetual Bond
News: (Continuation of DSE NEWS): The registered Stockbroker's/Merchant Bankers shall upload the lists of application from General Public (GP) to ESS and shall deposit the full subscription amount in between February 27, 2024 to February 29, 2024 (during banking hour). Please visit the following website for subscription related updates: https://www.essbangladesh.com." (end)

News Title: DSE NEWS:Commencement of subs. to the units of Southeast Bank 1st Perpetual Bond
News: (Continuation of DSE NEWS): Participating EIs & GPs will be required to pay full subscription amount (100%) and subscription fee only for EIs is Tk. 3,000.00 (three thousand only) through UCB Bank PLC (A/C Name: Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited, A/C No.: 1511308000000016). (cont.2)

News Title: DSE NEWS:Commencement of subs. to the units of Southeast Bank 1st Perpetual Bond
News: "Commencement of subscription to the units of Southeast Bank 1st Perpetual Bond for both EIs & GPs: The subscription to the units of Southeast Bank 1st Perpetual Bond for both Eligible Investors (EIs) & General Public (GPs) through electronic subscription system of the stock exchanges will start from 10:00 a.m. of February 18, 2024 and continue till 4.30 p.m. of February 25, 2024. Minimum subscription amount is BDT 5,000 (or its multiples) and there is no maximum bar. (cont.1)

News Title: KPPL: Inspection of the Factory premises & Head Office of the Company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange PLC. (DSE) visited the factory premises & head office of Khulna Printing & Packaging Limited on February 04, 2024 to inspect their current operational status and found closed.

News Title: DSE NEWS: Commencement of PP subscription of LB MULTI ASSET INCOME ETF by EI
News: (Cont. news of DSE NEWS): Minimum subscription amount is BDT 100,000 and maximum amount would be BDT 500,000,000. (cont.2)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Commencement of PP subscription of LB MULTI ASSET INCOME ETF by EI
News: Commencement of private placement subscription of LB MULTI ASSET INCOME ETF by the Eligible Investors (EIs) through electronic subscription system: The private placement subscription of the first ever Exchange Traded Fund at DSE, namely "LB MULTI ASSET INCOME ETF" will start from 10:00 a.m. of February 12, 2024 and continue till 4:30 p.m. of February 28, 2024, by the registered Eligible Investors (EIs) through electronic subscription system of the stock exchanges. (cont.1)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness message
News: DSENEWS: All Stock Dealers, Stock Brokers and Authorized Representatives are asked to strictly follow the code of conduct as enumerated in the Second Schedule to the Securities and Exchange Commission (Stock Dealer, Stock Broker and Authorized Representative) Rules, 2000.

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of DSE News): If anyone spreads information based on rumor, using patent of DSE, he/she will be held liable under Copyright Act, 2000 and it shall be treated as punishable offence under Section-17 of the Securities and Exchange Ordinance, 1969. (end)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: DSE does not publish market data through any social media pages. INVESTORS should not rely on any information from an unauthorized source such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Viber, Linkedin etc. (cont.)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of BSEC News - Awareness Message for Investors) 3. Do not pay any heed to rumors at the time of trading shares; it may cause loss to you. Even spreading rumor is legally prohibited. (Ref.: SEC letter no. SEC/SRMIC/2010/726 dated November 23, 2010). (end)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: Investors are requested to consider the following facts at the time of making investment decision in the Capital Market: 1. Without acquiring proper knowledge, information and experience regarding different aspects and matters of Capital Market, one should not invest in the Capital Market. 2. The gain or loss, whichever comes from the investment, it belongs to you. So, well - thought of investment decision based on knowledge and fundamentals of the securities may be real assistance to you. (cont.)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Greetings Message
News: Honorable Investors, Good morning! Please make your investment decision based on Company fundamentals, technical analysis, price level and disclosed information. Avoid rumor-based speculations.

News Title: CITYGENINS: Board Meeting schedule under LR 19(1)

News Title: BATBC: Price Limit Open
News: There will be no price limit on the trading of the shares of the Company today (11.02.2024) following its corporate declaration. However, the floor price shall be applicable accordingly.

News Title: BATBC: Dividend Declaration
News: (Continuation news of BATBC): The company has also informed that during 2023 EPS increased marginally due to growth in revenue offset by higher expenses. Expenses increased significantly due to impact from inflation and devaluation of taka. NOCFPS decreased due to higher payment of VAT, duty and tax to the government exchequer and payments to suppliers for materials and expenses. NAV increased due to higher inventory, receivables, and cash balances from increased sales. (end)

News Title: BATBC: Dividend Declaration
News: The Board of Directors has recommended 100% final cash dividend for the year ended December 31, 2023. Date of AGM: 28.03.2024, Time: 10:30 AM. Record date: 03.03.2024. The Company has reported EPS of Tk. 33.11, NAV per share of Tk. 99.33 and NOCFPS of Tk. 18.90 for the year ended December 31, 2023 as against Tk. 33.10, Tk. 76.27 and Tk. 50.04 respectively for the year ended December 31, 2022. (cont.)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness message
News: DSENEWS: All Stock Dealers, Stock Brokers and Authorized Representatives are asked to strictly follow the code of conduct as enumerated in the Second Schedule to the Securities and Exchange Commission (Stock Dealer, Stock Broker and Authorized Representative) Rules, 2000.

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of DSE News): If anyone spreads information based on rumor, using patent of DSE, he/she will be held liable under Copyright Act, 2000 and it shall be treated as punishable offence under Section-17 of the Securities and Exchange Ordinance, 1969. (end)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: DSE does not publish market data through any social media pages. INVESTORS should not rely on any information from an unauthorized source such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Viber, Linkedin etc. (cont.)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of BSEC News - Awareness Message for Investors) 3. Do not pay any heed to rumors at the time of trading shares; it may cause loss to you. Even spreading rumor is legally prohibited. (Ref.: SEC letter no. SEC/SRMIC/2010/726 dated November 23, 2010). (end)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: Investors are requested to consider the following facts at the time of making investment decision in the Capital Market: 1. Without acquiring proper knowledge, information and experience regarding different aspects and matters of Capital Market, one should not invest in the Capital Market. 2. The gain or loss, whichever comes from the investment, it belongs to you. So, well - thought of investment decision based on knowledge and fundamentals of the securities may be real assistance to you. (cont.)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Greetings Message
News: Honorable Investors, Good morning! Please make your investment decision based on Company fundamentals, technical analysis, price level and disclosed information. Avoid rumor-based speculations.

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: Investors are requested to consider the following facts at the time of making investment decision in the Capital Market: 1. Without acquiring proper knowledge, information and experience regarding different aspects and matters of Capital Market, one should not invest in the Capital Market. 2. The gain or loss, whichever comes from the investment, it belongs to you. So, well - thought of investment decision based on knowledge and fundamentals of the securities may be real assistance to you. (cont.)

Without acquiring proper knowledge, information and experience regarding different aspects and matters of Capital Market, one should not invest in the Capital Market. 2. The gain or loss, whichever comes from the investment, it belongs to you. So, well - thought of investment decision based on knowledge and fundamentals of the securities may be real assistance to you. (cont.)

News Title: GENEXIL: Agreement with RSGT Bangladesh Ltd. for building IT infrastructure
News: (Continuation news of GENEXIL): Under the agreement, Genex will build a state-of-the-art turnkey IT infrastructure for RSGT Bangladesh Ltd. at Patenga Container Terminal (PCT). This agreement will generate a revenue of BDT. 28.5 Crore over the next 1 year. (end)

News Title: GENEXIL: Agreement with RSGT Bangladesh Ltd. for building IT infrastructure
News: The Company has informed that the Board of Directors has approved an agreement with "Red Sea Gateway Terminal Bangladesh Limited "RSGT" a Saudi Arabian Company", who is assigned to operate Patenga Container Terminal (PCT) for next 22 years under a concession agreement with Chittagong Port Authority in a G2G Partnership Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. (cont.)

News Title: GP: Price Limit Open
News: There will be no price limit on the trading of the shares of the Company today (06.02.2024) following its corporate declaration. However, the floor price shall be applicable accordingly.

News Title: GP: Dividend Declaration
News: (Continuation news of GP): The company has also informed that Net Asset Value (NAV) as at 31 December 2023 is increased by 44% compared to that of 31 December 2022 mainly due to higher profit for the year 2023 compared to the dividend declared for the same year. Earnings Per Share (EPS) for the year 2023 is increased by 10% compared to that of 2022 mainly due to the increase in net profit after tax in 2023 compared to 2022. (end)

News Title: GP: Dividend Declaration
News: The Board of Directors has recommended 125% Final Cash Dividend for the year ended December 31, 2023 (which represents 51.03% of the Profit After Tax for the year 2023). Date of AGM: 02.05.2024, Time: 10:30 AM. Record date: 29.02.2024. The Company has also reported EPS of Tk. 24.49, NAV per share of Tk. 49.39 and NOCFPS of Tk. 44.88 for the year ended December 31, 2023 as against Tk. 22.29, Tk. 34.22 and Tk. 47.26 respectively for the year ended December 31, 2022. (cont.)

News Title: SPCL: Shutdown of plant operation due to expiration of contract with BPDB
News: (Continuation news of SPCL): The submission is currently under consideration by BPDB, and the company is expecting a positive result regarding the submission soon. (end)

News Title: SPCL: Shutdown of plant operation due to expiration of contract with BPDB
News: The Company has informed that pursuant to the Long-Term Rental Agreement for Power Purchase with Bangladesh Power Development Board, a 15 (Fifteen) years contract period is going to expire on 09.02.2024 at 24:00 Hours (Midnight). Consequently, the plant shall be shut down from the above time and discontinued from the national grid. However, the company has requested the renewal of the Power Purchase Agreement for a further period of 5 (Five) years under a no-electricity no-payment basis. (cont.)

News Title: FAMILYTEX: Inspection of the factory and head office premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises & head office of the company on September 27, 2023 & October 09, 2023 respectively to inspect their current operational status and found the factory closed. As well as, when the inspection team visited the head office located at House 127 (3rd Floor), Road 10, Block C, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka (as provided by the company), it was found that the head office is being used by another company named Olila Glass Industries Ltd.

News Title: REGENTTEX: Inspection of the factory premises of the company

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness message
News: DSENEWS: All Stock Dealers, Stock Brokers and Authorized Representatives are asked to strictly follow the code of conduct as enumerated in the Second Schedule to the Securities and Exchange Commission (Stock Dealer, Stock Broker and Authorized Representative) Rules, 2000.

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of DSE News): If anyone spreads information based on rumor, using patent of DSE, he/she will be held liable under Copyright Act, 2000 and it shall be treated as punishable offence under Section-17 of the Securities and Exchange Ordinance, 1969. (end)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: DSE does not publish market data through any social media pages. INVESTORS should not rely on any information from an unauthorized source such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Viber, Linkedin etc. (cont.)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of BSEC News - Awareness Message for Investors) 3. Do not pay any heed to rumors at the time of trading shares; it may cause loss to you. Even spreading rumor is legally prohibited. (Ref.: SEC letter no. SEC/SRMIC/2010/726 dated November 23, 2010). (end)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: Investors are requested to consider the following facts at the time of making investment decision in the Capital Market: 1. Without acquiring proper knowledge, information and experience regarding different aspects and matters of Capital Market, one should not invest in the Capital Market. 2. The gain or loss, whichever comes from the investment, it belongs to you. So, well - thought of investment decision based on knowledge and fundamentals of the securities may be real assistance to you. (cont.)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Greetings Message
News: Honorable Investors, Good morning! Please make your investment decision based on Company fundamentals, technical analysis, price level and disclosed information. Avoid rumor-based speculations.

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness message
News: DSENEWS: All Stock Dealers, Stock Brokers and Authorized Representatives are asked to strictly follow the code of conduct as enumerated in the Second Schedule to the Securities and Exchange Commission (Stock Dealer, Stock Broker and Authorized Representative) Rules, 2000.

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of DSE News): If anyone spreads information based on rumor, using patent of DSE, he/she will be held liable under Copyright Act, 2000 and it shall be treated as punishable offence under Section-17 of the Securities and Exchange Ordinance, 1969. (end)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: DSE does not publish market data through any social media pages. INVESTORS should not rely on any information from an unauthorized source such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Viber, Linkedin etc. (cont.)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of BSEC News - Awareness Message for Investors) 3. Do not pay any heed to rumors at the time of trading shares; it may cause loss to you. Even spreading rumor is legally prohibited. (Ref.: SEC letter no. SEC/SRMIC/2010/726 dated November 23, 2010). (end)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: Investors are requested to consider the following facts at the time of making investment decision in the Capital Market: 1. Without acquiring proper knowledge, information and experience regarding different aspects and matters of Capital Market, one should not invest in the Capital Market. 2. The gain or loss, whichever comes from the investment, it belongs to you. So, well - thought of investment decision based on knowledge and fundamentals of the securities may be real assistance to you. (cont.)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Greetings Message
News: Honorable Investors, Good morning! Please make your investment decision based on Company fundamentals, technical analysis, price level and disclosed information. Avoid rumor-based speculations.

News: The Company has informed that the Board of Directors has decided to halt production activities of Ready-mix Concrete (RMC) Plant (24,00,000 CFT capacity per annum) located at Sea-Beach Road, South Patenga, Chattogram, due to disruption in raw materials import for crisis of foreign currency (dollar), prevailing stagnation in domestic infrastructure development and newly imposed of VAT on Ready-mix business has led to price hikes and shrinking demand significantly.

News Title: FAMILYTEX: Inspection of the factory and head office premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises & head office of the company on September 27, 2023 & October 09, 2023 respectively to inspect their current operational status and found the factory closed. As well as, when the inspection team visited the head office located at House 127 (3rd Floor), Road 10, Block C, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka (as provided by the company), it was found that the head office is being used by another company named Olila Glass Industries Ltd.

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness message
News: DSENEWS: All Stock Dealers, Stock Brokers and Authorized Representatives are asked to strictly follow the code of conduct as enumerated in the Second Schedule to the Securities and Exchange Commission (Stock Dealer, Stock Broker and Authorized Representative) Rules, 2000.

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of DSE News): If anyone spreads information based on rumor, using patent of DSE, he/she will be held liable under Copyright Act, 2000 and it shall be treated as punishable offence under Section-17 of the Securities and Exchange Ordinance, 1969. (end)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: DSE does not publish market data through any social media pages. INVESTORS should not rely on any information from an unauthorized source such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Viber, Linkedin etc. (cont.)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of BSEC News - Awareness Message for Investors) 3. Do not pay any heed to rumors at the time of trading shares; it may cause loss to you. Even spreading rumor is legally prohibited. (Ref.: SEC letter no. SEC/SRMIC/2010/726 dated November 23, 2010). (end)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: Investors are requested to consider the following facts at the time of making investment decision in the Capital Market: 1. Without acquiring proper knowledge, information and experience regarding different aspects and matters of Capital Market, one should not invest in the Capital Market. 2. The gain or loss, whichever comes from the investment, it belongs to you. So, well - thought of investment decision based on knowledge and fundamentals of the securities may be real assistance to you. (cont.)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Greetings Message
News: Honorable Investors, Good morning! Please make your investment decision based on Company fundamentals, technical analysis, price level and disclosed information. Avoid rumor-based speculations.

News Title: FAMILYTEX: Inspection of the factory and head office premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises & head office of the company on September 27, 2023 & October 09, 2023 respectively to inspect their current operational status and found the factory closed. As well as, when the inspection team visited the head office located at House 127 (3rd Floor), Road 10, Block C, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka (as provided by the company), it was found that the head office is being used by another company named Olila Glass Industries Ltd.

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness message
News: DSENEWS: All Stock Dealers, Stock Brokers and Authorized Representatives are asked to strictly follow the code of conduct as enumerated in the Second Schedule to the Securities and Exchange Commission (Stock Dealer, Stock Broker and Authorized Representative) Rules, 2000.

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of DSE News): If anyone spreads information based on rumor, using patent of DSE, he/she will be held liable under Copyright Act, 2000 and it shall be treated as punishable offence under Section-17 of the Securities and Exchange Ordinance, 1969. (end)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: DSE does not publish market data through any social media pages. INVESTORS should not rely on any information from an unauthorized source such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Viber, Linkedin etc. (cont.)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of BSEC News - Awareness Message for Investors) 3. Do not pay any heed to rumors at the time of trading shares; it may cause loss to you. Even spreading rumor is legally prohibited. (Ref.: SEC letter no. SEC/SRMIC/2010/726 dated November 23, 2010). (end)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: Investors are requested to consider the following facts at the time of making investment decision in the Capital Market: 1. Without acquiring proper knowledge, information and experience regarding different aspects and matters of Capital Market, one should not invest in the Capital Market. 2. The gain or loss, whichever comes from the investment, it belongs to you. So, well - thought of investment decision based on knowledge and fundamentals of the securities may be real assistance to you. (cont.)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Greetings Message
News: Honorable Investors, Good morning! Please make your investment decision based on Company fundamentals, technical analysis, price level and disclosed information. Avoid rumor-based speculations.

News: Today's (30.01.2024) Total Trades: 251,847; Volume: 293,276,390 and Turnover: Tk. 9,398.697 million.

News Title: BGIC: Name Change of the Company
News: Dhaka Stock Exchange PLC. (DSE) has approved the proposed name change of the Company. Accordingly, the name of the Company will be 'Bangladesh General Insurance Company PLC.' instead of 'Bangladesh General Insurance Company Ltd.' with effect from January 31, 2024. Other things (except name) will remain unchanged.

News Title: BEACONPHAR: Appointment of Company Secretary
News: The Company has informed that the Board of Directors has appointed Mr. Md. Sahabuddin FCS as the Company Secretary of the Company with immediate effect.

News Title: DBLPBOND: Resumption after Record date
News: Trading of Dhaka Bank Perpetual Bond will resume on 31.01.2024.

News Title: SKICL: Board Meeting schedule under LR 19(1)
News: As per Regulation 19(1) of the Dhaka Stock Exchange (Listing) Regulations, 2015, the Company has informed that a meeting of the Board of Directors will be held on February 07, 2024 at 2:45 PM to consider, among others, audited financial statements of the Company for the year ended December 31, 2023.

News Title: SONALIPAPR: Decision to add new product line i.e. Aluminum House foil
News: (Continuation news of SONALIPAPR): The company has also informed that few new moulds have been imported for producing different sizes of aluminum food container boxes. The company strongly believes that upon utilization of full capacity of the new machine and moulds, these will have significant impact on its competitive position in the market in addition to increasing its revenue. (end)

News Title: SONALIPAPR: Decision to add new product line i.e. Aluminum House foil
News: The company has informed that the Board of Directors of the Company has decided to add new product line i.e. Aluminum House foil. A machine has already been imported and installed in its factory premises. The product will be suitable for cooking, freezing, wrapping and storing of various food items. The production capacity of the machine is to produce 3,500 pieces aluminum house foil per day and 12,60,000 pieces (approx.) per annum. (cont.)

News Title: ACFL: Reschedule of Board Meeting under LR 16(1)
News: The Company has further informed that due to unavoidable circumstances the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company as per Regulation 16(1) of the Dhaka Stock Exchange (Listing) Regulations, 2015, will be held on January 31, 2024 at 4:30 PM to consider, among others, un-audited financial statements of the Company for the Second Quarter (Q2) period ended December 31, 2023.

News Title: KAY&QUE: Postponement of Board Meeting schedule under LR 16(1)
News: The Company has further informed that due to unavoidable circumstances, the meeting scheduled to be held on January 30, 2024 at 2:30 PM as per Regulation 16(1) of the Dhaka Stock Exchange (Listing) Regulations, 2015, to consider, among others, un-audited financial statements of the Company for the Second Quarter (Q2) period ended December 31, 2023, has been postponed.

News Title: METROSPIN: Sale of Land
News: The company has informed that in line with the PSI published on 11.10.2021, 08.08.2023 and 21.09.2023 regarding the BMRE of the company, the Board of Directors has decided to sale land measuring area 8.60 decimals at Uttara, Dhaka-1230 and to sale land measuring area 59.00 deciamls at Ashulia, Savar, Dhaka-1230. The proceeds from the sale of land shall be utilized for the repayment of Bank Loan. The company also informed that the sale proceed will accelerate the implementation of BMRE of Project.

News: DSENEWS: All Stock Dealers, Stock Brokers and Authorized Representatives are asked to strictly follow the code of conduct as enumerated in the Second Schedule to the Securities and Exchange Commission (Stock Dealer, Stock Broker and Authorized Representative) Rules, 2000.

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of DSE News): If anyone spreads information based on rumor, using patent of DSE, he/she will be held liable under Copyright Act, 2000 and it shall be treated as punishable offence under Section-17 of the Securities and Exchange Ordinance, 1969. (end)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: DSE does not publish market data through any social media pages. INVESTORS should not rely on any information from an unauthorized source such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Viber, Linkedin etc. (cont.)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of BSEC News - Awareness Message for Investors) 3. Do not pay any heed to rumors at the time of trading shares; it may cause loss to you. Even spreading rumor is legally prohibited. (Ref.: SEC letter no. SEC/SRMIC/2010/726 dated November 23, 2010). (end)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: Investors are requested to consider the following facts at the time of making investment decision in the Capital Market: 1. Without acquiring proper knowledge, information and experience regarding different aspects and matters of Capital Market, one should not invest in the Capital Market. 2. The gain or loss, whichever comes from the investment, it belongs to you. So, well - thought of investment decision based on knowledge and fundamentals of the securities may be real assistance to you. (cont.)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Greetings Message
News: Honorable Investors, Good morning! Please make your investment decision based on Company fundamentals, technical analysis, price level and disclosed information. Avoid rumor-based speculations.

News: (Continuation news of DSENEWS): which is in accordance with the BSEC consent letter to NRB Bank Limited Ref: BSEC/CI/IPO-341/2023/1559 dated December 24, 2023. Minimum and maximum amount allowed for subscription for General Public would be BDT 10,000 (ten thousand) or its multiple. The registered TREC Holders/ Merchant bankers have to upload the IPO application file of General Public in the Electronic Subscription System (ESS) from 10:00 AM of February 4, 2024 to 4:30 PM of February 6, 2024 (cont.2)

News Title: DSENEWS: Commencement of ES of NRB Bank Ltd. through ESS by General Public
News: The subscription for shares of NRB Bank Limited will be started from 10.00 AM of January 28, 2024 and continued till 4:30 PM of February 1, 2024. Minimum required investment for General Public (GP) will be BDT 50,000 (fifty thousand only) and for Non-resident Bangladeshi (NRB) will be BDT 100,000 (one lakh only) as on January 18, 2024 (day-end) in matured listed securities at market price (between the close price of both Exchanges whichever is higher) (cont.1)

News Title: FAMILYTEX: Inspection of the factory and head office premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises & head office of the company on September 27, 2023 & October 09, 2023 respectively to inspect their current operational status and found the factory closed. As well as, when the inspection team visited the head office located at House 127 (3rd Floor), Road 10, Block C, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka (as provided by the company), it was found that the head office is being used by another company named Olila Glass Industries Ltd.

News Title: REGENTTEX: Inspection of the factory premises of the company

News Title: DULAMIACOT: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory of Dulamia Cotton Spinning Mills Limited on September 24, 2023 for inspection on their current operational status. News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness message
News: DSENEWS: All Stock Dealers, Stock Brokers and Authorized Representatives are asked to strictly follow the code of conduct as enumerated in the Second Schedule to the Securities and Exchange Commission (Stock Dealer, Stock Broker and Authorized Representative) Rules, 2000.

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of DSE News): If anyone spreads information based on rumor, using patent of DSE, he/she will be held liable under Copyright Act, 2000 and it shall be treated as punishable offence under Section-17 of the Securities and Exchange Ordinance, 1969. (end)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: DSE does not publish market data through any social media pages. INVESTORS should not rely on any information from an unauthorized source such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Viber, Linkedin etc. (cont.)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of BSEC News - Awareness Message for Investors) 3. Do not pay any heed to rumors at the time of trading shares; it may cause loss to you. Even spreading rumor is legally prohibited. (Ref.: SEC letter no. SEC/SRMIC/2010/726 dated November 23, 2010). (end)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: Investors are requested to consider the following facts at the time of making investment decision in the Capital Market: 1. Without acquiring proper knowledge, information and experience regarding different aspects and matters of Capital Market, one should not invest in the Capital Market. 2. The gain or loss, whichever comes from the investment, it belongs to you. So, well - thought of investment decision based on knowledge and fundamentals of the securities may be real assistance to you. (cont.)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Greetings Message
News: Honorable Investors, Good morning! Please make your investment decision based on Company fundamentals, technical analysis, price level and disclosed information. Avoid rumor-based speculations.

News Title: STANCERAM: Regarding temporary closure of the factory
News: The company has informed that the production in the factory is currently stopped due to the post-corona financial crisis, the current global negative situation, shortage of raw materials and closure of gas and electricity supply. Due to which the authority has decided to temporarily close the factory. The factory will stay temporarily closed from 26.01.2024 until supply of gas and electricity become normal.

News Title: AGNISYSL: Q2 Financials
News: (Continuation news of AGNISYSL): The variance in NOCFPS is chiefly attributed to heightened expenses associated with establishing eleven new offices beyond the Dhaka district and operating expenditures related to network expansion, hiring of new manpower, and sales and marketing expenses. (end)

News Title: AGNISYSL: Q2 Financials
News: (Continuation news of AGNISYSL): This expansion involved the establishment of new offices, the recruitment of additional manpower, the development of a robust Fiber Optic Network, and the acquisition of equipment for support and maintenance. They also added that they have already commenced revenue generation from these eleven new business areas, evident in this quarter's financial reports, and they anticipate continuous revenue growth each month. (cont.3)

News Title: AGNISYSL: Q2 Financials
News: (Continuation news of AGNISYSL): Reasons for Deviation in EPS and NOCFPS: The company has informed that there has been an impact on their Half Yearly Earnings Per Share (EPS) compared to the same period in the previous year due to their considerable business expansion, notably extending into eleven previously uncharted districts: Kushtia, Sylhet, Jashore, Barishal, Khulna, Sirajganj, Bogura, Narayanganj, Rajshahi, Mymensingh, and Rangpur. (cont.2)

News: The subscription for shares of NRB Bank Limited will be started from 10.00 AM of January 28, 2024 and continued till 4:30 PM of February 1, 2024. Minimum required investment for General Public (GP) will be BDT 50,000 (fifty thousand only) and for Non-resident Bangladeshi (NRB) will be BDT 100,000 (one lakh only) as on January 18, 2024 (day-end) in matured listed securities at market price (between the close price of both Exchanges whichever is higher) (cont.1)

News Title: FAMILYTEX: Inspection of the factory and head office premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises & head office of the company on September 27, 2023 & October 09, 2023 respectively to inspect their current operational status and found the factory closed. As well as, when the inspection team visited the head office located at House 127 (3rd Floor), Road 10, Block C, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka (as provided by the company), it was found that the head office is being used by another company named Olila Glass Industries Ltd.

News Title: USMANIAGL: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises of Usmania Glass Sheet Factory Limited on September 26, 2023. During the visit, the inspection team found that the operation of the Company was closed.

News Title: REGENTTEX: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises of Regent Textile Mills Limited on September 26, 2023. During the visit, the inspection team found that the operation of the Company was closed.

News Title: DULAMIACOT: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory of Dulamia Cotton Spinning Mills Limited on September 24, 2023 for inspection on their current operational status. The team could not enter into the factory of the company and could not perform the aforesaid inspection since the factory was fully closed and sealed.

News Title: NORTHERN: Inspection of the factory premises and head office
News: (Continuation news of NORTHERN): As well as, when visited the head office located in Dhaka, it was found that the head office premises has been using by OMC Limited. (end)

News Title: NORTHERN: Inspection of the factory premises and head office
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises on September 4, 2023 and head office on September 5, 2023 of Northern Jute Manufacturing Company Limited for inspection on their current operational status. The team could not enter into the factory premises of the company and could not perform the aforesaid inspection since the factory premises was fully closed. (cont.)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness message
News: DSENEWS: All Stock Dealers, Stock Brokers and Authorized Representatives are asked to strictly follow the code of conduct as enumerated in the Second Schedule to the Securities and Exchange Commission (Stock Dealer, Stock Broker and Authorized Representative) Rules, 2000.

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of DSE News): If anyone spreads information based on rumor, using patent of DSE, he/she will be held liable under Copyright Act, 2000 and it shall be treated as punishable offence under Section-17 of the Securities and Exchange Ordinance, 1969. (end)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: DSE does not publish market data through any social media pages. INVESTORS should not rely on any information from an unauthorized source such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Viber, Linkedin etc. (cont.)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of BSEC News - Awareness Message for Investors) 3. Do not pay any heed to rumors at the time of trading shares; it may cause loss to you. Even spreading rumor is legally prohibited. (Ref.: SEC letter no. SEC/SRMIC/2010/726 dated November 23, 2010). (end)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: Investors are requested to consider the following facts at the time of making investment decision in the Capital Market: 1. Without acquiring proper knowledge, information and experience regarding different aspects and matters of Capital Market, one should not invest in the Capital Market. 2. The gain or loss, whichever comes from the investment, it belongs to you. So, well - thought of investment decision based on knowledge and fundamentals of the securities may be real assistance to you. (cont.)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Greetings Message
News: Honorable Investors, Good morning! Please make your investment decision based on Company fundamentals, technical analysis, price level and disclosed information. Avoid rumor-based speculations.

News Title: BERGERPBL: Revised Project Cost of Third Factory of the Company
News: Refer to the earlier news of the Company disseminated by DSE on 30.10.2022, the company has further informed that the revised project cost of the third factory at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Shilpa Nagar is estimated at BDT 8.13 billion. The third factory is expected to commence production in April 2026.

News Title: BERGERPBL: EGM for approval of Rights Issuance, amendments in AOA and Others
News: (Continuation news of BERGERPBL): and subsequently by Bangladesh Securities and Exchange Commission (BSEC). News Title: BERGERPBL: EGM for approval of Rights Issuance, amendments in AOA and Others
News: (Continuation news of BERGERPBL): Issuance of Rights Share: The Board of Directors has decided to increase paid-up capital of the Company through issuance of 1:17 Rights Share (1 Rights Share against 17 existing shares of the Company) to all the shareholders at an issue price of BDT 1,376 per share including premium of BDT 1,366 for each Right Share subject to the approval of the shareholders in the ensuing Extraordinary General Meeting (EGM) (cont.3)

News Title: BERGERPBL: EGM for approval of Rights Issuance, amendments in AOA and Others
News: (Continuation news of BERGERPBL): Record Date for EGM: February 14, 2024. The shareholders whose names would appear in the Register of Members of the Company on the Record Date shall be entitled to attend and vote at the EGM. A separate Record Date for the entitlement of the Rights Share will be declared after Bangladesh Securities and Exchange Commission accords approval to the Rights Share offer. (cont.2)

News Title: BERGERPBL: EGM for approval of Rights Issuance, amendments in AOA and Others
News: The Company has informed that an Extraordinary General Meeting (EGM) will be held on March 10, 2024, at 10:30 a.m. through the use of hybrid platform to accord approval to the Rights Issuance and renouncement plan and amendments of the Articles of Association. Members will have the option to participate either in person at the location of the EGM or virtually. The link for voting and virtually attending the EGM is HTTPS://BERGER.BDVIRTUALAGM.COM. Place of the EGM will be notified later. (cont.1)

News Title: BERGERPBL: Q3 Financials
News: (Continuation news of BERGERPBL): Reasons for deviation in EPS and NOCFPS: Despite lower growth in revenue in 2023-24, the EPS increased significantly mainly due to soft raw-materials price and increase in investment income though partially impacted by foreign exchange loss. NOCFPS significantly increased from same period of last year mainly due to increase in trade creditors impacted by deferring import payments. (end)

News Title: BERGERPBL: Q3 Financials
News: (Q3 un-audited): Consolidated EPS was Tk. 18.30 for October-December 2023 as against Tk. 14.73 for October-December 2022; Consolidated EPS was Tk. 49.38 for April-December 2023 as against Tk. 44.16 for April-December 2022. Consolidated NOCFPS was Tk. 103.22 for April-December 2023 as against Tk. 6.23 for April-December 2022. Consolidated NAV per share was Tk. 289.70 as on December 31, 2023 and Tk. 279.78 as on March 31, 2023. (cont.)

News Title: RUNNERAUTO: Q2 Financials
News: (Continuation news of RUNNERAUTO): Reasons for deviation in EPS, NOCFPS and NAVPS are as follows: i) Three Wheeler business derives significant growth in the revenue line which resulted positive EPS in last quarter. ii) Repayment to the supplier resulted decrease in NOCFPS. iii) Negative profitability caused the reduction of NAVPS. (end)

News Title: RUNNERAUTO: Q2 Financials
News: (Q2 Un-audited): Consolidated EPS was Tk. 0.05 for October-December 2023 as against Tk. (2.08) for October-December 2022; Consolidated EPS was Tk. (2.22) for July-December 2023 as against Tk. (2.89) for July-December 2022. Consolidated NOCFPS was Tk. 13.62 for July-December 2023 as against Tk. 15.86 for July-December 2022. Consolidated NAV per share was Tk. 60.41 as on December 31, 2023 and Tk. 62.62 as on June 30, 2023. (cont.)

News Title: CBLPBOND: Declaration of Record Date
News: The City Bank Limited, issuer of City Bank Perpetual Bond has informed that Record Date for the bond will be on February 15, 2024 for entitlement of coupon payments to be made on March 03, 2024 at the rate of 10.00% p.a. for the period from September 01, 2023 to February 29, 2024.

News Title: GEMINISEA: Q2 Financials
News: (Continuation news of GEMINISEA): Reasons for significant deviation in EPS, NAVPS and NOCFPS: EPS has been increased mainly due to increase in revenue than the previous period and significant price increase. NAVPS has been increased due to earned profit during the period. NOCFPS has been decreased due to insignificant amount realized from sales than the previous period. (end)

News Title: GEMINISEA: Q2 Financials
News: (Q2 Un-audited): EPS was Tk. 4.01 for October-December 2023 as against Tk. 1.72 for October-December 2022; EPS was Tk. 4.60 for July-December 2023 as against Tk. 4.06 for July-December 2022. NOCFPS was Tk. (6.32) for July-December 2023 as against Tk. 4.46 for July-December 2022. NAV per share was Tk. 19.61 as on December 31, 2023 and Tk. 14.30 as on June 30, 2023. (cont.)

News Title: INDEXAGRO: Q2 Financials
News: (Continuation news of INDEXAGRO): Reasons for Deviation in EPS and NOCFPS: EPS has been decreased due to foreign exchange rate fluctuation loss and increase in finance cost. NOCFPS has been increased due to less payment to suppliers and others. (end)

News Title: INDEXAGRO: Q2 Financials

News Title: FAMILYTEX: Inspection of the factory and head office premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises & head office of the company on September 27, 2023 & October 09, 2023 respectively to inspect their current operational status and found the factory closed. As well as, when the inspection team visited the head office located at House 127 (3rd Floor), Road 10, Block C, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka (as provided by the company), it was found that the head office is being used by another company named Olila Glass Industries Ltd.

News Title: REGENTTEX: Inspection of the factory premises of the company

News Title: DULAMIACOT: Inspection of the factory premises of the company

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness message
News: DSENEWS: All Stock Dealers, Stock Brokers and Authorized Representatives are asked to strictly follow the code of conduct as enumerated in the Second Schedule to the Securities and Exchange Commission (Stock Dealer, Stock Broker and Authorized Representative) Rules, 2000.

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of DSE News): If anyone spreads information based on rumor, using patent of DSE, he/she will be held liable under Copyright Act, 2000 and it shall be treated as punishable offence under Section-17 of the Securities and Exchange Ordinance, 1969. (end)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: DSE does not publish market data through any social media pages. INVESTORS should not rely on any information from an unauthorized source such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Viber, Linkedin etc. (cont.)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of BSEC News - Awareness Message for Investors) 3. Do not pay any heed to rumors at the time of trading shares; it may cause loss to you. Even spreading rumor is legally prohibited. (Ref.: SEC letter no. SEC/SRMIC/2010/726 dated November 23, 2010). (end)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: Investors are requested to consider the following facts at the time of making investment decision in the Capital Market: 1. Without acquiring proper knowledge, information and experience regarding different aspects and matters of Capital Market, one should not invest in the Capital Market. 2. The gain or loss, whichever comes from the investment, it belongs to you. So, well - thought of investment decision based on knowledge and fundamentals of the securities may be real assistance to you. (cont.)

News Title: DSE NEWS: Greetings Message
News: Honorable Investors, Good morning! Please make your investment decision based on Company fundamentals, technical analysis, price level and disclosed information. Avoid rumor-based speculations.

News: (Q2 Un-audited): Diluted EPS was Tk. 0.80 for October-December 2023 as against Tk. 0.59 for October-December 2022; Diluted EPS was Tk. 1.45 for July-December 2023 as against Tk. 1.23 for July-December 2022. NOCFPS was Tk. 0.30 for July-December 2023 as against Tk. 2.21 for July-December 2022. NAV per share was Tk. 40.01 as on December 31, 2023 and Tk. 38.57 as on June 30, 2023.

News Title: SALAMCRST: Q2 Financials
News: (Continuation news of SALAMCRST): Reasons for Deviation: Net Profit after Tax has decreased due to decrease of Revenue & increase of Finance Cost in comparison with the corresponding previous period. Decrease of Collection from the Customers and increase of Payment to the Suppliers during the period as compared to the corresponding period has resulted in significant decrease in NOCFPS. (end)

News Title: SALAMCRST: Q2 Financials
News: (Q2 Un-audited): Consolidated EPS was Tk. 0.06 for October-December 2023 as against Tk. 0.18 for October-December 2022; Consolidated EPS was Tk. 0.09 for July-December, 2023 as against Tk. 0.30 for July-December, 2022. Consolidated NOCFPS was Tk. (52.38) for July-December, 2023 as against Tk. (24.44) for July-December, 2022. Consolidated NAV per share was Tk. 18.64 as on December 31, 2023 and Tk. 18.55 as on June 30, 2023. (cont.)

News Title: ENVOYTEX: Q1 Financials
News: (Q1 Un-audited): Diluted EPS was Tk. 0.65 for July-September 2023 as against Tk. 0.64 for July-September 2022; NOCFPS was Tk. (0.57) for July-September 2023 as against Tk. 0.80 for July-September 2022. NAV per share was Tk. 39.21 as on September 30, 2023 and Tk. 38.57 as on June 30, 2023.

News Title: ENVOYTEX: Price Limit Open
News: There will be no price limit on the trading of the shares of the Company today (24.01.2024) following its corporate declaration.

News Title: ENVOYTEX: Dividend Declaration
News: (Cont. news of ENVOYTEX): The Company has also reported EPS of Tk. 1.95, NAV per share of Tk. 38.57 and NOCFPS of Tk. 6.99 for the year ended June 30, 2023 as against Tk. 2.99, Tk. 38.21 and Tk. 3.43 respectively for the year ended June 30, 2022. (end)

News Title: ENVOYTEX: Dividend Declaration
News: The Board of Directors has recommended 15% Cash dividend for the year ended June 30, 2023. Date of AGM: 13.03.2024, Time: 11:00 AM, Venue: The AGM will be conducted through a hybrid system at Envoy Tower, 14th Floor, 18/E Lake Circus Kalabagan. Members will have the option to participate either in person at the specified location or virtually through Digital Platform. Record date: 15.02.2024. (cont.)

News Title: SICL: Prohibition on providing loan facilities to purchase securities
News: DSE NEWS: The Stock Brokers, Merchant Bankers and Portfolio Managers are requested to abstain from providing loan facilities to purchase securities of Sikder Insurance Company Limited in between 1st to 30th trading day starting from today i.e., January 24, 2024 as per BSEC Directive No. BSEC/CMRRCD/2009-193/32 dated December 26, 2021.

News Title: EHL: Q2 Financials
News: (Continuation news of EHL): Reasons for deviation in NOCFPS are as follows: i) The company received Tk. 30 crore in last year against sale of one apartment project at a time which is not usual collection pattern. ii) Collection against plot sales dropped significantly because of registration difficulties. (end)

News: DSE does not publish market data through any social media pages. INVESTORS should not rely on any information from an unauthorized source such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Viber, Linkedin etc. (cont.)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: (Continuation of BSEC News - Awareness Message for Investors) 3. Do not pay any heed to rumors at the time of trading shares; it may cause loss to you. Even spreading rumor is legally prohibited. (Ref.: SEC letter no. SEC/SRMIC/2010/726 dated November 23, 2010). (end)

News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors
News: Investors are requested to consider the following facts at the time of making investment decision in the Capital Market: 1. Without acquiring proper knowledge, information and experience regarding different aspects and matters of Capital Market, one should not invest in the Capital Market. 2. The gain or loss, whichever comes from the investment, it belongs to you. So, well - thought of investment decision based on knowledge and fundamentals of the securities may be real assistance to you. (cont.)

News Title: FAMILYTEX: Inspection of the factory and head office premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises & head office of the company on September 27, 2023 & October 09, 2023 respectively to inspect their current operational status and found the factory closed. As well as, when the inspection team visited the head office located at House 127 (3rd Floor), Road 10, Block C, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka (as provided by the company), it was found that the head office is being used by another company named Olila Glass Industries Ltd.

News Title: USMANIAGL: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises of Usmania Glass Sheet Factory Limited on September 26, 2023. During the visit, the inspection team found that the operation of the Company was closed.

News Title: REGENTTEX: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises of Regent Textile Mills Limited on September 26, 2023. During the visit, the inspection team found that the operation of the Company was closed.

News Title: DULAMIACOT: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory of Dulamia Cotton Spinning Mills Limited on September 24, 2023 for inspection on their current operational status. The team could not enter into the factory of the company and could not perform the aforesaid inspection since the factory was fully closed and sealed.

News Title: NORTHERN: Inspection of the factory premises and head office
News: (Continuation news of NORTHERN): As well as, when visited the head office located in Dhaka, it was found that the head office premises has been using by OMC Limited. (end)

News Title: NORTHERN: Inspection of the factory premises and head office

News Title: WALTONHIL: Q2 Financials (Additional Information)
News: (Q2 Un-audited): Reasons for deviation in EPS: The Company incurred Foreign Currency Exchange losses during the period from July 01, 2023 to December 31, 2023 amounting to Tk. 43.75 crore only as against Tk. 336.10 crore in the same period of the previous Financial Year 2022-2023. Mainly, as a result of this significant decrease of Foreign Currency Exchange losses in Financial Costs, the Company makes Net Profit After Tax amounting to Tk. 340.35 crore during the period (cont.)

News Title: WALTONHIL: Q2 Financials
News: (Q2 Un-audited): EPS was Tk. 4.56 for October-December 2023 as against Tk. 2.00 for October-December 2022; EPS was Tk. 11.24 for July-December 2023 as against Tk. 0.47 for July-December 2022. NOCFPS was Tk. 27.16 for July-December 2023 as against Tk. 61.07 for July-December 2022. NAV per share was Tk. 345.75 (with revaluation) as on December 31, 2023 and Tk. 343.73 as on June 30, 2023. NAV per share was Tk. 244.26 (without revaluation) as on December 31, 2023 and Tk. 242.18 as on June 30, 2023.

News Title: PENINSULA: Q2 Financials
News: (Continuation news of PENINSULA): Cost of sales also increased by 12.66%, and non-Operating profit increased by 107.28% compared with the previous period. As a result, EPS increased by 56%. NOCFPS has decreased due to an increase in cash payment to other sources 1,444.41% and cash paid to suppliers 23.73% and due to higher collection of revenue 1.54%. Selling and Distribution Expenses increased 68.58%. As a result, NOCFPS decreased significantly. (end)

News Title: FAMILYTEX: Inspection of the factory and head office premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises & head office of the company on September 27, 2023 & October 09, 2023 respectively to inspect their current operational status and found the factory closed. As well as, when the inspection team visited the head office located at House 127 (3rd Floor), Road 10, Block C, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka (as provided by the company), it was found that the head office is being used by another company named Olila Glass Industries Ltd.

News Title: USMANIAGL: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises of Usmania Glass Sheet Factory Limited on September 26, 2023. During the visit, the inspection team found that the operation of the Company was closed.

News Title: REGENTTEX: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises of Regent Textile Mills Limited on September 26, 2023. During the visit, the inspection team found that the operation of the Company was closed.

News Title: DULAMIACOT: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory of Dulamia Cotton Spinning Mills Limited on September 24, 2023 for inspection on their current operational status. The team could not enter into the factory of the company and could not perform the aforesaid inspection since the factory was fully closed and sealed.

News Title: NORTHERN: Inspection of the factory premises and head office
News: (Continuation news of NORTHERN): As well as, when visited the head office located in Dhaka, it was found that the head office premises has been using by OMC Limited. (end)

News Title: NORTHERN: Inspection of the factory premises and head office

News Title: BDLAMPS: Q2 Financials
News: (Continuation news of BDLAMPS): EPS has been decreased due to decrease in sale revenue, and increase in material costs and finance costs. NOCFPS has been decreased due to decrease in sales and collections, a substantial increase in inventory and lower gross margin. NAVPS has been decreased mainly due to increase in short term finance. (end)

News Title: BDLAMPS: Q2 Financials
News: (Q2 Un-audited): EPS was Tk. (4.63) for October-December 2023 as against Tk. 1.63 (restated) for October-December 2022; EPS was Tk. (11.23) for July-December 2023 as against Tk. 3.28 (restated) for July-December 2022. NOCFPS was Tk. (11.26) for July-December 2023 as against Tk. (1.47) (restated) for July-December 2022. NAV per share was Tk. 70.46 as on December 31, 2023 and Tk. 83.78 (restated) as on December 31, 2022. Reasons for deviation in EPS, NOCFPS and NAVPS: (cont.)

News Title: FAMILYTEX: Inspection of the factory and head office premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises & head office of the company on September 27, 2023 & October 09, 2023 respectively to inspect their current operational status and found the factory closed. As well as, when the inspection team visited the head office located at House 127 (3rd Floor), Road 10, Block C, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka (as provided by the company), it was found that the head office is being used by another company named Olila Glass Industries Ltd.

News Title: USMANIAGL: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises of Usmania Glass Sheet Factory Limited on September 26, 2023. During the visit, the inspection team found that the operation of the Company was closed.

News Title: REGENTTEX: Inspection of the factory premises of the company

News Title: DULAMIACOT: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory of Dulamia Cotton Spinning Mills Limited on September 24, 2023 for inspection on their current operational status. News Title: FAMILYTEX: Inspection of the factory and head office premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises & head office of the company on September 27, 2023 & October 09, 2023 respectively to inspect their current operational status and found the factory closed. As well as, when the inspection team visited the head office located at House 127 (3rd Floor), Road 10, Block C, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka (as provided by the company), it was found that the head office is being used by another company named Olila Glass Industries Ltd.

News Title: FAMILYTEX: Inspection of the factory and head office premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises & head office of the company on September 27, 2023 & October 09, 2023 respectively to inspect their current operational status and found the factory closed. As well as, when the inspection team visited the head office located at House 127 (3rd Floor), Road 10, Block C, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka (as provided by the company), it was found that the head office is being used by another company named Olila Glass Industries Ltd.

News: The company has informed that the Board of Directors of the company has taken, among others, the following decision: "The Commercial Production of the 6th Unit of Crown Cement PLC. with a Production Capacity of 8,280 Metric Ton per day installed at its Factory Premises West Mukterpur, Munshiganj will commence in the month of January 2024 instead of its previous probable schedule of February 2023 due to delay caused by Russia-Ukraine War in supply of Machineries by the Suppliers."

News Title: FAMILYTEX: Inspection of the factory and head office premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises & head office of the company on September 27, 2023 & October 09, 2023 respectively to inspect their current operational status and found the factory closed. As well as, when the inspection team visited the head office located at House 127 (3rd Floor), Road 10, Block C, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka (as provided by the company), it was found that the head office is being used by another company named Olila Glass Industries Ltd.

News Title: USMANIAGL: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises of Usmania Glass Sheet Factory Limited on September 26, 2023. During the visit, the inspection team found that the operation of the Company was closed.

News Title: REGENTTEX: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises of Regent Textile Mills Limited on September 26, 2023. During the visit, the inspection team found that the operation of the Company was closed.

News Title: DULAMIACOT: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory of Dulamia Cotton Spinning Mills Limited on September 24, 2023 for inspection on their current operational status. The team could not enter into the factory of the company and could not perform the aforesaid inspection since the factory was fully closed and sealed.

News Title: NORTHERN: Inspection of the factory premises and head office
News: (Continuation news of NORTHERN): As well as, when visited the head office located in Dhaka, it was found that the head office premises has been using by OMC Limited. (end)

News Title: NORTHERN: Inspection of the factory premises and head office
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises on September 4, 2023 and head office on September 5, 2023 of Northern Jute Manufacturing Company Limited for inspection on their current operational status. The team could not enter into the factory premises of the company and could not perform the aforesaid inspection since the factory premises was fully closed. (cont.)

News Title: GLOBALINS: Share Transmission of Deceased Sponsor Director among his successors
News: The Company has informed that Ar. Mubasshar Hussain who was a sponsor director of the company passed away on January 02, 2023. His total holding of 8,11,031 shares of the company will be transmitted according to the Succession Certificate issued by the Honorable Court. As per the succession certificate, Ms. Akter Banu (wife) will receive 1,01,379 shares, Mr. Sayeed Hussain (Son) will receive 4,73,101 shares and Ms. Sonia Hussain Kristy (Daughter) will receive 2,36,551 shares.

News Title: PLFSL: Extension of suspension period of Trading of Shares
News: (DSENEWS): Referring to the earlier news disseminated on 27.12.2023 regarding Trading suspension of Shares of the Company, the Management of DSE, upon authorization of the Board, has decided to extend the suspension period of trading of shares of the Company for further period of 15 days effective from January 15, 2024 in accordance with Sub-Section (7) & (8) of the Section 9 of the Securities and Exchange Ordinance, 1969 and Regulation 50 of the Dhaka Stock Exchange (Listing) Regulations, 2015.

News Title: BANGAS: Board Meeting schedule under LR 16(1)
News: As per Regulation 16(1) of the Dhaka Stock Exchange (Listing) Regulations, 2015, the Company has informed that a meeting of the Board of Directors will be held on January 17, 2024 at 3:30 PM to consider, among others, un-audited financial statements of the Company for the First Quarter (Q1) period ended September 30, 2023.

News Title: WALTONHIL: Sale Declaration of a Sponsor Director
News: Mr. S. M. Ashraful Alam, one of the Sponsor Directors of the Company, has expressed his intention to sell 150,000 shares out of his holding of 65,855,111 shares of the company at prevailing market price (in the Block Market) through Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited within next 30 working days.

News Title: BARKAPOWER: Sale declaration of a Corporate Director
News: Fusion Holdings (Pvt.) Limited, one of the Corporate Directors of the Company, has expressed its intention to sell 3,00,000 shares out of its holding of 1,97,87,992 shares of the Company at prevailing market price (In the Public/Block Market) through Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) within next 30 working days.

News Title: RINGSHINE: Reschedule of AGM Date
News: Refer to the earlier news of the company disseminated by DSE on 28.11.2023, the Company has further informed that the 26th AGM of the company will be held on March 6, 2024 at 10:30 am instead of earlier declared date on January 20, 2024 at 10:30 am. Venue of AGM: Digital Platform. The record date and agendas will remain same.

News Title: BXPHARMA: Managing Director Resigns to Join Newly Formed Cabinet
News: The company has announced that Mr. Nazmul Hassan MP, the company's Managing Director and Member of the Board, will step down with immediate effect. This follows an invitation from the Prime Minister for Mr. Hassan to join the newly formed Cabinet as a Minister after the recent Bangladesh Parliamentary Election on January 07, 2024.

News Title: FAMILYTEX: Inspection of the factory and head office premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises & head office of the company on September 27, 2023 & October 09, 2023 respectively to inspect their current operational status and found the factory closed. As well as, when the inspection team visited the head office located at House 127 (3rd Floor), Road 10, Block C, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka (as provided by the company), it was found that the head office is being used by another company named Olila Glass Industries Ltd.

News Title: USMANIAGL: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises of Usmania Glass Sheet Factory Limited on September 26, 2023. During the visit, the inspection team found that the operation of the Company was closed.

News Title: REGENTTEX: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises of Regent Textile Mills Limited on September 26, 2023. During the visit, the inspection team found that the operation of the Company was closed.

News Title: DULAMIACOT: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory of Dulamia Cotton Spinning Mills Limited on September 24, 2023 for inspection on their current operational status. The team could not enter into the factory of the company and could not perform the aforesaid inspection since the factory was fully closed and sealed.

News Title: NORTHERN: Inspection of the factory premises and head office
News: (Continuation news of NORTHERN): As well as, when visited the head office located in Dhaka, it was found that the head office premises has been using by OMC Limited. (end)

News Title: NORTHERN: Inspection of the factory premises and head office
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises on September 4, 2023 and head office on September 5, 2023 of Northern Jute Manufacturing Company Limited for inspection on their current operational status. The team could not enter into the factory premises of the company and could not perform the aforesaid inspection since the factory premises was fully closed. (cont.)

News Title: IMAMBUTTON: Regarding start of production of tannery unit
News: The company has informed that the production of tannery unit has been started on January 11, 2024. At present total production area is 11000 square feet including 1000 square feet office area. The company is producing 100 percent genuine leather shoes. The current production capacity is 530 pairs per day and 160000 pairs per annum. The production system is Semi automated. The company has also added that the expected turnover of the tannery unit will be Tk. 25 crore and profit will be Tk. 2 crore per annum.

News Title: UNIONCAP: Query Response

As well as, when the inspection team visited the head office located at House 127 (3rd Floor), Road 10, Block C, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka (as provided by the company), it was found that the head office is being used by another company named Olila Glass Industries Ltd.

News Title: STANDBANKL: Name Change of the Company
News: Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) has approved the proposed name change of the Company. Accordingly, the name of the Company will be 'Standard Bank PLC.' instead of 'Standard Bank Limited' with effect from January 09, 2024. Other things (except name) will remain unchanged.

News Title: AOL: Price Limit Open
News: There will be no price limit on the trading of the shares of the Company today (08.01.2024) following its corporate declaration. However, the floor price shall be applicable accordingly.

News Title: AOL: Dividend Declaration & adjusting un-utilized amount of IPO related expenses
News: (Continuation news of AOL): Tk. 1.67, Tk. 18.56 and Tk. 3.11 respectively for the year ended June 30, 2022. Reasons for deviation in EPS and NOCFPS: EPS decreased due to dull economic conditions, the Russia-Ukraine War and improved of Covid condition in the current Medical Oxygen sale significantly failed. NOCFPS decreased due to collection from customer decrease and operating expenses, selling & distribution expenses are decreased. (end)

News Title: AOL: Dividend Declaration & adjusting un-utilized amount of IPO related expenses
News: (Continuation news of AOL): of Plant & Machinery subject to, approval of the Bangladesh Securities and Exchange Commission and the Shareholder of the Company in the next Annual General Meeting (AGM). Information regarding AGM & record date will be notified later. The Company has reported EPS of Tk. 1.59, NAV per share of Tk. 19.33 and NOCFPS of Tk. 2.54 for the year ended June 30, 2023 as against (cont.2)

News Title: AOL: Dividend Declaration & adjusting un-utilized amount of IPO related expenses
News: The Board of Directors has recommended 1% Cash dividend for general shareholders only excluding directors and sponsors for the year ended June 30, 2023. Sponsors and directors hold 3,36,55,905 shares out of total 10,97,82,000 shares and cash dividend payable to general shareholders is Tk. 76,12,610.00 for 7,61,26,095 shares. The board of directors has decided Un-utilized amount Tk. 24,11,666.00 of initial public offering (IPO Related expenses) unadjusted fund will be adjusted with acquisition (cont.1)

News Title: EPGL: Q1 Financials
News: (Continuation news of EPGL): Reasons for deviation in EPS and NOCFPS: EPS has decreased due to a slowdown of sales in comparison to operational gearing at the same level. NOCFPS has been decreased due to a slowdown of sales along with credit recovery and increase in operational gearing. (end)

News Title: EPGL: Q1 Financials
News: (Q1 Un-audited): EPS was Tk. 0.05 for July-September 2023 as against Tk. 0.10 for July-September 2022; NOCFPS was Tk. 0.01 for July-September 2023 as against Tk. 3.24 for July-September 2022. NAV per share (with revaluation) was Tk. 42.97 as on September 30, 2023 and Tk. 43.18 as on June 30, 2023, NAV per share (without revaluation) was Tk. 31.06 as on September 30, 2023 and Tk. 31.28 as on June 30, 2023. (cont.)

News Title: FAMILYTEX: Inspection of the factory and head office premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises & head office of the company on September 27, 2023 & October 09, 2023 respectively to inspect their current operational status and found the factory closed. As well as, when the inspection team visited the head office located at House 127 (3rd Floor), Road 10, Block C, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka (as provided by the company), it was found that the head office is being used by another company named Olila Glass Industries Ltd.

News Title: DHAKAINS: Credit Rating Result
News: Credit Rating Information and Services Limited (CRISL) has assigned rating of the Company as CPA "AA" in the long term along with a Stable outlook in consideration of its audited financials up to December 31, 2022 also unaudited financials up to September 30, 2023 and other relevant quantitative as well as qualitative information up to the date of rating declaration.

News Title: DSE NEWS: Holiday for 12th National Election
News: The Government has declared January 07, 2024 as a public holiday due to the 12th National Election. As such, the trading and official activities of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited will remain closed on January 07, 2024. The trading and official activities will resume on January 08, 2024 accordingly.

News Title: DULAMIACOT: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory of Dulamia Cotton Spinning Mills Limited on September 24, 2023 for inspection on their current operational status.
