News Title: SPCERAMICS: Credit Rating Result
News: Emerging Credit Rating Limited (ECRL) has affirmed surveillance rating of the Company as "AA-" in the long term and "ST-2" in the short term along with a Stable outlook based on audited financial statements up to June 30, 2023, unaudited financial statements of Q1 2024 and other relevant quantitative as well as qualitative information up to the date of rating.

News Title: EPGL: Credit Rating Result
News: Bangladesh Rating Agency Limited (BDRAL) has assigned rating of the Company as "AA" for long term and "ST-4" for short term along with a Developing outlook in consideration of its audited financials up to June 30, 2023 and unaudited financials up to September 30,2023 along with other relevant quantitative as well as qualitative information up to the date of rating declaration.

News Title: FUWANGCER: Credit Rating Result (Revised)
News: WASO Credit Rating Company (BD) Ltd. has assigned the entity rating of the Company as "A" for long term and "ST 3" for short term along with Stable outlook based on audited financial statements of FY2023 (30.06.2023) and other relevant qualitative and quantitative information.

News Title: EPGL: Board Meeting schedule under LR 16(1)
News: As per Regulation 16(1) of the Dhaka Stock Exchange (Listing) Regulations, 2015, the Company has informed that a meeting of the Board of Directors will be held on January 04, 2024 at 5:00 PM to consider, among others, un-audited financial statements of the Company for the First Quarter (Q1) period ended September 30, 2023.

News Title: BANKASI1PB: Prohibition on providing loan facilities to purchase bond
News: DSE NEWS: The Stock Brokers, Merchant Bankers and Portfolio Managers are requested to abstain from providing loan facilities to purchase Bank Asia 1st Perpetual Bond in between 1st to 30th trading day starting from today i.e., January 01, 2024 as per BSEC Directive No. BSEC/CMRRCD/2009-193/32 dated December 26, 2021.

News Title: BANKASI1PB: Trading of Bank Asia 1st Perpetual Bond
News: (Continuation news of BANKASI1PB): Some salient features of the bond are as follows: 1. Name of the Bond: Bank Asia 1st Perpetual Bond, 2. Issuer: Bank Asia Limited, 3. Issue price: BDT 5,000 per bond, 4. Face value: BDT 5,000 per bond, 5. Market lot: 01, 6. Tenure: N/A, 7. Coupon Rate: 6%-10%, 8. Coupon payment frequency: 02. (end)

News Title: BANKASI1PB: Trading of Bank Asia 1st Perpetual Bond
News: Trading of Bank Asia 1st Perpetual Bond will start from today i.e., January 01, 2024 under 'N' category. DSE Trading Code for Bank Asia 1st Perpetual Bond is "BANKASI1PB" and DSE Scrip Code is 26016 under 'Corporate Bond' sector. (cont.)

News Title: LOVELLO: Extending time further for utilizing the rest of the IPO amount
News: The company has informed that the shareholders of the company in its 12th AGM held on December 30, 2023 approved the proposal to extend time for further period of 01(One) year from February 2024 to January 2025 for utilizing the rest of the IPO amount.

News Title: DBH: BSEC Consent to issue Non-Convertible Redeemable Fixed Coupon Senior Bond
News: (Continuation news of DBH): under the following key features: Type of Issuance: Non-Convertible Redeemable Fixed Coupon Senior Bond, Issue Size: Up to BDT 3.50 Billion (in face value), Tenure: Up to 5 years from the issue date, Purpose: To provide affordable housing financing facility to lower and middle income households (end)

News Title: DBH: BSEC Consent to issue Non-Convertible Redeemable Fixed Coupon Senior Bond
News: Refer to their earlier news disseminated by DSE on 18.09.2023 regarding board approval to issue Non-Convertible Redeemable Fixed Coupon Senior Bond, the Company has further informed that Bangladesh Securities and Exchange Commission has accorded its consent to DBH Finance PLC for issuance of Non-Convertible Redeemable Fixed Coupon Senior Bond through private placement solely to be subscribed by International Finance Corporation (IFC) (cont.)

News Title: SONALIANSH: Postponement of 42nd AGM
News: (Continuation news of SONALIANSH): The New record date of stock dividend as well as new date for holding of 42nd Annual General Meeting (AGM) will be informed shortly in compliance of section 81(2) of Companies Act, 1994 (Direction from Honorable High Court) as well as guideline issued by BSEC on this behalf. (end)

News Title: SONALIANSH: Postponement of 42nd AGM
News: The Company has informed that the 42nd Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company which was scheduled to be held on 31.12.2023 has been postponed as they are yet to receive consent of issuance of 100% stock dividend from Bangladesh Securities and Exchange Commission (BSEC). (cont.)

Minimum required investment for Resident Bangladeshi (RB) will be BDT 50,000 (fifty thousand only) (cont.1)

News Title: FAMILYTEX: Inspection of the factory and head office premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises & head office of the company on September 27, 2023 & October 09, 2023 respectively to inspect their current operational status and found the factory closed. As well as, when the inspection team visited the head office located at House 127 (3rd Floor), Road 10, Block C, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka (as provided by the company), it was found that the head office is being used by another company named Olila Glass Industries Ltd.

News Title: USMANIAGL: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises of Usmania Glass Sheet Factory Limited on September 26, 2023. During the visit, the inspection team found that the operation of the Company was closed.

News Title: REGENTTEX: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises of Regent Textile Mills Limited on September 26, 2023. During the visit, the inspection team found that the operation of the Company was closed.

News Title: DULAMIACOT: Inspection of the factory premises of the company
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory of Dulamia Cotton Spinning Mills Limited on September 24, 2023 for inspection on their current operational status. The team could not enter into the factory of the company and could not perform the aforesaid inspection since the factory was fully closed and sealed.

News Title: NORTHERN: Inspection of the factory premises and head office
News: (Continuation news of NORTHERN): As well as, when visited the head office located in Dhaka, it was found that the head office premises has been using by OMC Limited. (end)

News Title: NORTHERN: Inspection of the factory premises and head office
News: A team of Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited (DSE) visited the factory premises on September 4, 2023 and head office on September 5, 2023 of Northern Jute Manufacturing Company Limited for inspection on their current operational status. The team could not enter into the factory premises of the company and could not perform the aforesaid inspection since the factory premises was fully closed. (cont.)

News Title: DSENEWS: New Year Greetings
News: Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited wishes a very happy and prosperous "New Year" to all of our respectable Regulators, Investors, TREC Holders, Listed Companies and well-wishers of the Capital Market of Bangladesh. May the New Year 2024 bring hope, peace and success in every sphere of life.
